title: Development and Application of Blended Learning Assessment Tools for Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Development of blended learning assessment tools combining language learning microlearning content with face-to-face sessions in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve a language learning satisfaction level of 4.0/5.0 or higher in blended learning environments
Learners recognize the integration effect of mobile microlearning and face-to-face classes at 75% or higher
Learners accurately diagnose their own learning outcomes at 80% or higher through developed assessment tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
